fieldUpdates.description: Registration no. will be generated using AutoNumber field if it is not null else considers last 6 digits of Opp Id as the field was created earlier without considering Generate auto number for old records.
fieldUpdates.name: Generate Registration No.
Opp: Add First Date Of 1 Lost
Opp: Add First Date Of 3 Calling on
Opp: Add First Date Of 4 Evaluation
Opp: Add First Date Of 5 Design-in
Opp: Add First Date Of 6 Prototypes
Opp: Add First Date Of 7 Pre-Production
Opp: Add First Date Of 8 Production
Opp: Add First Date Of 9 Closed - EoL

fieldUpdates.description: Name the Opportunity as Lead Project Name, used for Lead conversion
fieldUpdates.name: Opp: Name as Lead Project Name
Opp: Update Latest Status Technical Mod.

fieldUpdates.description: clear the checkbox that was set to initiate mailing
fieldUpdates.name: Opp: clear checkbox "Send mail.."

fieldUpdates.description: When the status of an opportunity changes, record the date of change
fieldUpdates.name: Opp: copy date status change

fieldUpdates.description: Copy today's date to field "Design-in Date"
fieldUpdates.name: Opp: copy design-in date

fieldUpdates.description: Copy planned annual quantity from lead value.
fieldUpdates.name: Opp: set Annual Qty to lead value

fieldUpdates.description: Copy the value from lead conversion
fieldUpdates.name: Opp: set Close Date to Lead value

fieldUpdates.description: Concatenate information in all fields from lead conversion
fieldUpdates.formula: if(len( Lead_Submitter__c )=0,"",BR() & "Info submitted by: " & Lead_Submitter__c & " on " & text( Lead_Submit_Date__c ) & BR()) & if(len( Lead_Project_Description__c )=0,"", "Project description: " & Lead_Project_Description__c & BR() & BR()) & if(len(Lead_Stage__c)=0,"","Project stage: " & Lead_Stage__c & BR()) & if(len(text( Lead_Production_Date__c))=0,"","Dates: " & if(len(text( Lead_Proto_Date__c))=0,"","prototypes: " & text( Lead_Proto_Date__c) & "; ") & "start production: " & text( Lead_Production_Date__c ) & BR()) & if(Lead_Planned_Qty__c=0,"","Planned annual quantity: " & text( Lead_Planned_Qty__c) & br()) & /* kept for Leads created before Opp Product launch */ if(len(Lead_GPS_Product__c)=0,"","GPS Product: " & Lead_GPS_Product__c & "; ") & if(len(Lead_Wireless_Product__c)=0,"","Wireless Product: " & Lead_Wireless_Product__c & "; ") & if(len(Lead_Wireless_Product__c)=0,"",br()) & if(len(Lead_Products_Of_Interest__c)=0,"","Products of interest: " & Lead_Products_Of_Interest__c & ";" & BR()) & if(len(Lead_End_Customer__c)=0,"","End customer: " & Lead_End_Customer__c & ", " & Lead_End_Customer_Country__c & "; ") & if(len(Lead_Design_House__c)=0,"","Design-house: " & Lead_Design_House__c & ", " & Lead_Design_House_Country__c & "; ") & if(len(Lead_CM__c)=0,"","Manufacturing: " & Lead_CM__c & ", " & Lead_CM_Country__c ) & br() & /* kept for Leads created before Opp Product launch */ if(len(Lead_Current_GPS_Qty__c)=0,"","Current annual GPS quantity: " & Lead_Current_GPS_Qty__c & BR()) & if(len(Lead_Current_Qty__c)=0,"","Current annual quantity: " & Lead_Current_Qty__c & BR()) & if(len(Lead_Current_GPS_Supplier__c )=0,"","Current GPS supplier: " & Lead_Current_GPS_Supplier__c & BR()) & if(len(Lead_Current_Suppliers__c)=0,"","Current suppliers: " & Lead_Current_Suppliers__c & BR()) & if(len(Lead_Current_Wireless_Qty__c)=0,"","Current annual wireless quantity: " & Lead_Current_Wireless_Qty__c & BR()) & if(len( Lead_Current_Wireless_Supplier__c )=0,"","Current wireless supplier: " & Lead_Current_Wireless_Supplier__c & BR()) & if(len( Lead_Submitter__c )=0,"","Project information submitted by: " & Lead_Submitter__c & BR()) & if(len( Lead_Request__c )=0,"",BR() & "Request: " & Lead_Request__c) & if(len( Lead_uB_Contact__c )=0,"", BR() & "u-blox contact: " & Lead_uB_Contact__c)
fieldUpdates.name: Opp: set Project Info to lead values

fieldUpdates.description: Copy prototyping date from lead value
fieldUpdates.name: Opp: set Proto Date to Lead value

fieldUpdates.description: Set initial value of market sucess after lead conversion
fieldUpdates.name: Opp: set market success

fieldUpdates.description: Set initial stage to Calling on after lead conversion
fieldUpdates.name: Opp: set stage
Opp: set uB Office Opp DH EMEA
Opp: set uB Office Opp DW EMEA
Opp: set uB Office Opp Owner EMEA

fieldUpdates.description: Set Registration Expiration date to today date + 6 months
fieldUpdates.name: Set Registration Expiration

fieldUpdates.description: System field Amount is set equal to Opportunity Revenue
fieldUpdates.name: Update Opp Amount

rules.fullName: Lead conversion%3A set Opportunity field Start Production%28Close Date%29
rules.description: Populate Opportunity fields after Lead conversion

rules.fullName: Lead conversion%3A set Opportunity fields
rules.description: Populate Opportunity fields after Lead conversion

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Add First Date Of 1 Lost
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISBLANK(First_Date_Of_1_Lost__c), TEXT(StageName)="1 Lost" )

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Add First Date Of 3 Calling on
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISBLANK(First_Date_Of_3_Calling_on__c), OR( TEXT(StageName)="3 Calling on", TEXT(StageName)="4 Evaluation", TEXT(StageName)="5 Design-in", TEXT(StageName)="6 Prototypes", TEXT(StageName)="7 Pre-Production", TEXT(StageName)="8 Production" ) )

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Add First Date Of 3 Calling on %28on creation%29
rules.description: Added to populate the field when Opportunity is created.
rules.formula: AND(ISBLANK(First_Date_Of_3_Calling_on__c), OR( TEXT(StageName)="3 Calling on", TEXT(StageName)="4 Evaluation", TEXT(StageName)="5 Design-in", TEXT(StageName)="6 Prototypes", TEXT(StageName)="7 Pre-Production", TEXT(StageName)="8 Production" ) )

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Add First Date Of 4 Evaluation
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISBLANK(First_Date_Of_4_Evaluation__c), OR( TEXT(StageName)="4 Evaluation", TEXT(StageName)="5 Design-in", TEXT(StageName)="6 Prototypes", TEXT(StageName)="7 Pre-Production", TEXT(StageName)="8 Production" ) )

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Add First Date Of 5 Design-in
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISBLANK(First_Date_Of_5_Design_in__c), OR( TEXT(StageName)="5 Design-in", TEXT(StageName)="6 Prototypes", TEXT(StageName)="7 Pre-Production", TEXT(StageName)="8 Production" ) )

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Add First Date Of 6 Prototypes
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISBLANK(First_Date_Of_6_Prototypes__c), OR( TEXT(StageName)="6 Prototypes", TEXT(StageName)="7 Pre-Production", TEXT(StageName)="8 Production" ) )

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Add First Date Of 7 Pre-Production
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISBLANK(First_Date_Of_7_Pre_Production__c), OR( TEXT(StageName)="7 Pre-Production", TEXT(StageName)="8 Production" ) )

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Add First Date Of 8 Production
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISBLANK(First_Date_Of_8_Production__c), TEXT(StageName)="8 Production" )

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Add First Date Of 9 Closed - EoL
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISBLANK(First_Date_Of_9_Closed_EoL__c), TEXT(StageName)="9 Closed - EoL" )

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Global Distribution Registration Approved
Opp%3A Inform Owner if Opp edited by distributor
rules.description: Email alert if opportunity has been edited by distributors (only APAC)
rules.formula:
true /* commenting this to minimize the number of references.
(ISCHANGED(StageName) || ISCHANGED(Product_1__c) || ISCHANGED(Product_2__c) || ISCHANGED(Product_3__c) || ISCHANGED(Latest_Status__c) || ISCHANGED(Decision_Date__c) || ISCHANGED(Proto_Date__c) || ISCHANGED(CloseDate))&& (LastModifiedById <> OwnerId) && ISPICKVAL(LastModifiedBy.UserType, "Partner") && NOT (ISPICKVAL(Account.uB_Office__c, "Americas") || ISPICKVAL(Account.uB_Office__c, "EMEA")) */

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Name as Lead Project Name
rules.description: Name the Opportunity created through Lead conversion as Project Name given in the Lead.

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Owner different from Account Owner
rules.description: Email notification to both Account and Opportunity Owners when they are different

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Populate FAE Email
rules.description: Used to send email alert to FAE

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Quotation reminder EMEA
rules.formula:
true /* commenting this to minimize the number of references. AND( RecordType.Id="01220000000CqRd", ISPICKVAL(Account.New_Channel_Manager__r.uB_Office__c, "EMEA") )
*/

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Reminder Decision Date
rules.description: Reminder of Decision Date (NOTE: For all Focus now, this WF was previously only for Focus=1,2)
rules.formula:
true /* commenting this to minimize the number of references.
Note: Add the following only to put Opportunities into the WF queue Time_Based_WF_Flag__c=true,
AND(
RecordTypeId="01220000000CqRn", OR( text(StageName)="3 Calling on", text(StageName)="4 Evaluation"), OR( text(Account.uB_Office__c)="EMEA", OwnerId="00520000000zbAX") ) */

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Reminder Decision Date %28Focus%3D3%2C4%29
rules.description: Reminder of Decision Date
rules.formula:
true /* Note: Add the following only to put Opportunities into the WF queue Time_Based_WF_Flag__c=true, Time_Based_WF_Flag__c=true,
AND(
RecordTypeId="01220000000CqRn", OR( text(StageName)="3 Calling on", text(StageName)="4 Evaluation"), OR( text(Focus__c)="3 - Territory", text(Focus__c)="4 - Area"), OR( text(Account.uB_Office__c)="EMEA", OwnerId="00520000000zbAX"))
*/

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Reminder Decision Date %28Focus%3D5%29
rules.description: Reminder of Decision Date (Focus=5, only to Partner Users)
rules.formula: AND( /* Time_Based_WF_Flag__c=true, */ RecordTypeId="01220000000CqRn", OR( text(StageName)="3 Calling on", text(StageName)="4 Evaluation"), text(Focus__c)="5 - Portal", OR( OwnerId="00520000000zbAX", OwnerId="005D0000004U64L", OwnerId="005D0000002nqcS", OwnerId="005D00000032d61", OwnerId="00557000005u8qm", OwnerId="005D0000001xDP3", OwnerId="005D0000001xDf1", OwnerId="005D0000002156W", OwnerId="005D0000001CVnx", OwnerId="00557000005SEV1", OwnerId="00557000005SB9v", OwnerId="005D0000001CTah", OwnerId="005D0000001xDeT", OwnerId="005D0000001CTaX", OwnerId="005D0000001CUQn", OwnerId="00557000005u8qr", OwnerId="005D0000001xDP8", OwnerId="005D0000004Udkt", OwnerId="005D0000001xExa", OwnerId="005D0000001xcp7", OwnerId="005D0000001xPQn", OwnerId="005D0000001xEyi", OwnerId="005D0000001xdWL", OwnerId="005D0000004T0sc", OwnerId="005D0000001xHNg", OwnerId="005570000063REz", OwnerId="005D0000003xVWa", OwnerId="005D0000001CUR2", OwnerId="005D00000034Yms", OwnerId="005D0000003HWYY", OwnerId="005D00000021IX6", OwnerId="005D0000002X6Cz", OwnerId="005D0000004Vxle", OwnerId="005D0000003FBJv", OwnerId="005D0000002WJC0" ))

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Reminder Latest Status not updated since 4 weeks %28Focus%3D1%2C2%29
rules.description: Reminder to Account Owner to update Latest Status.
rules.formula:
true /* commenting this to minimize the number of references.
AND( RecordTypeId="01220000000CqRn", OR(text(Focus__c)="1 - Corporate", text(Focus__c)="2 - Region"), OR(text(StageName)="3 Calling on", text(StageName)="4 Evaluation", text(StageName)="5 Design-in", text(StageName)="6 Prototypes", text(StageName)="7 Pre-Production"), OR(text(Account.uB_Office__c)="EMEA", OwnerId="00520000000zbAX") ) */

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Reminder Latest Status not updated since 4 weeks %28Focus%3D2%29
rules.description: Reminder to Account Owner to update Latest Status.
rules.formula: true /* commenting this to minimize the number of references. AND( RecordTypeId="01220000000CqRn", text(Focus__c)="2 - Region", OR( text(StageName)="3 Calling on", text(StageName)="4 Evaluation", text(StageName)="5 Design-in", text(StageName)="6 Prototypes", text(StageName)="7 Pre-Production" ), OR( text(Account.uB_Office__c)="EMEA", OwnerId="00520000000zbAX" ) ) */

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Reminder Proto Date %28Focus%3D1%2C2%29
rules.description: Reminder of milestone dates (Decision Date, Proto Date)
rules.formula: true /* commenting this to minimize the number of references. AND( RecordTypeId="01220000000CqRn", OR( text(StageName)="3 Calling on", text(StageName)="4 Evaluation", text(StageName)="5 Design-in"), OR( text(Focus__c)="1 - Corporate", text(Focus__c)="2 - Region"), OR( text(Account.uB_Office__c)="EMEA", OwnerId="00520000000zbAX")) */

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Reminder Proto Date %28Focus%3D5%29
rules.description: Reminder of milestone dates (Decision Date, Proto Date, Focus=5 only to Partner Users)
rules.formula: AND( RecordTypeId="01220000000CqRn", OR( text(StageName)="3 Calling on", text(StageName)="4 Evaluation", text(StageName)="5 Design-in"), text(Focus__c)="5 - Portal", OR( OwnerId="00520000000zbAX", OwnerId="005D0000004U64L", OwnerId="005D0000002nqcS", OwnerId="005D00000032d61", OwnerId="00557000005u8qm", OwnerId="005D0000001xDP3", OwnerId="005D0000001xDf1", OwnerId="005D0000002156W", OwnerId="005D0000001CVnx", OwnerId="00557000005SEV1", OwnerId="00557000005SB9v", OwnerId="005D0000001CTah", OwnerId="005D0000001xDeT", OwnerId="005D0000001CTaX", OwnerId="005D0000001CUQn", OwnerId="00557000005u8qr", OwnerId="005D0000001xDP8", OwnerId="005D0000004Udkt", OwnerId="005D0000001xExa", OwnerId="005D0000001xcp7", OwnerId="005D0000001xPQn", OwnerId="005D0000001xEyi", OwnerId="005D0000001xdWL", OwnerId="005D0000004T0sc", OwnerId="005D0000001xHNg", OwnerId="005570000063REz", OwnerId="005D0000003xVWa", OwnerId="005D0000001CUR2", OwnerId="005D00000034Yms", OwnerId="005D0000003HWYY", OwnerId="005D00000021IX6", OwnerId="005D0000002X6Cz", OwnerId="005D0000004Vxle", OwnerId="005D0000003FBJv", OwnerId="005D0000002WJC0" ))

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Reminder Start Production
rules.description: Reminder of Start Production (NOTE: For all Focus now, this WF was previously only for Focus=1,2)
rules.formula:
true /* commenting this to minimize the number of references.
AND( RecordTypeId="01220000000CqRn", OR( text(StageName)="3 Calling on", text(StageName)="4 Evaluation", text(StageName)="5 Design-in", text(StageName)="6 Prototypes", text(StageName)="7 Pre-Production"), OR( text(Account.uB_Office__c)="EMEA", OwnerId="00520000000zbAX") ) */

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Reminder Start Production %28Focus%3D3%2C4%29
rules.description: Reminder of Start Production
rules.formula:
true /* commenting this to minimize the number of references.
AND( RecordTypeId="01220000000CqRn", OR( text(StageName)="3 Calling on", text(StageName)="4 Evaluation", text(StageName)="5 Design-in", text(StageName)="6 Prototypes", text(StageName)="7 Pre-Production"), OR( text(Focus__c)="3 - Territory", text(Focus__c)="4 - Area"), OR(text(Account.uB_Office__c)="EMEA", OwnerId="00520000000zbAX")) */

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Reminder Start Production %28Focus%3D5%29
rules.description: Reminder of Start Production (Focus=5, only to the Partner Users)
rules.formula: AND( /* Time_Based_WF_Flag__c=true, */ RecordTypeId="01220000000CqRn", OR( text(StageName)="3 Calling on", text(StageName)="4 Evaluation", text(StageName)="5 Design-in", text(StageName)="6 Prototypes", text(StageName)="7 Pre-Production"), text(Focus__c)="5 - Portal", OR( OwnerId="00520000000zbAX", OwnerId="005D0000004U64L", OwnerId="005D0000002nqcS", OwnerId="005D00000032d61", OwnerId="00557000005u8qm", OwnerId="005D0000001xDP3", OwnerId="005D0000001xDf1", OwnerId="005D0000002156W", OwnerId="005D0000001CVnx", OwnerId="00557000005SEV1", OwnerId="00557000005SB9v", OwnerId="005D0000001CTah", OwnerId="005D0000001xDeT", OwnerId="005D0000001CTaX", OwnerId="005D0000001CUQn", OwnerId="00557000005u8qr", OwnerId="005D0000001xDP8", OwnerId="005D0000004Udkt", OwnerId="005D0000001xExa", OwnerId="005D0000001xcp7", OwnerId="005D0000001xPQn", OwnerId="005D0000001xEyi", OwnerId="005D0000001xdWL", OwnerId="005D0000004T0sc", OwnerId="005D0000001xHNg", OwnerId="005570000063REz", OwnerId="005D0000003xVWa", OwnerId="005D0000001CUR2", OwnerId="005D00000034Yms", OwnerId="005D0000003HWYY", OwnerId="005D00000021IX6", OwnerId="005D0000002X6Cz", OwnerId="005D0000004Vxle", OwnerId="005D0000003FBJv", OwnerId="005D0000002WJC0" ))

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Reminder Start Production Today
rules.description: Reminder of Start Production
rules.formula:
true /* commenting this to minimize the number of references.
AND( RecordTypeId="01220000000CqRn", OR( text(StageName)="3 Calling on", text(StageName)="4 Evaluation", text(StageName)="5 Design-in", text(StageName)="6 Prototypes", text(StageName)="7 Pre-Production"), OR( text(Focus__c)="1 - Corporate", text(Focus__c)="2 - Region", text(Focus__c)="3 - Territory", text(Focus__c)="4 - Area"), OR(text(Account.uB_Office__c)="EMEA", OwnerId="00520000000zbAX") ) */

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Reminder of Stage 4 to FAE
rules.description: Reminder to FAE of Stage 4
rules.formula: true /* commenting this to minimize the number of references. and( ischanged(StageName), text(StageName)="4 Evaluation", OR(text(Focus__c)="1 - Corporate",text(Focus__c)="2 - Region",text(Focus__c)="3 - Territory"),text(Account.uB_Office__c)="EMEA" ) */

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Reminder of Stage 5 to FAE
rules.description: Reminder of Stage 5 to FAE (NOTE: Previously this WF was only for Focus=1,2,3)
rules.formula: true /* commenting this to minimize the number of references. and( ischanged(StageName), text(StageName)="5 Design-in", text(Account.uB_Office__c)="EMEA" ) */

rules.fullName: Opp%3A Update Latest Status Technical Modified date
rules.description: When Status of Opportunity changes, record the date of change
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Latest_Status_Technical__c)

rules.fullName: Opp%3A embargo countries
rules.description: Reminder that the created record is for embargo countries
rules.formula: true /* commenting this to minimize the number of references. OR( Account.BillingCountry="CU", Account.BillingCountry="BY", Account.BillingCountry="IR", Account.BillingCountry="KP", Account.BillingCountry="SD", Account.BillingCountry="SY", Account.BillingCountry="UA", Account.BillingCountry="AM", Account.BillingCountry="AZ", Account.BillingCountry="CF", Account.BillingCountry="CG", Account.BillingCountry="CI", Account.BillingCountry="ER", Account.BillingCountry="GN", Account.BillingCountry="IQ", Account.BillingCountry="LB", Account.BillingCountry="LR", Account.BillingCountry="LY", Account.BillingCountry="MM", Account.BillingCountry="SO", Account.BillingCountry="ZW") */

rules.fullName: Opp%3A record status change date
rules.description: When Status of Opportunity changes, record the date of change
rules.formula: ischanged ( Latest_Status__c )

rules.fullName: Opp%3A set area fields to EMEA
rules.description: For new opportunities set the uB Office fields for design, owner, and design win to EMEA.

rules.fullName: Opportunity%3A alert for CDMA module project
rules.description: When a CDMA module opportunity is created or the stage of the opportunity changes, send an alert to a group of people
rules.formula: true /* commenting this to minimize the number of references. and( or( ischanged(Product_1__c), ischanged(Product_2__c), ischanged(Product_3__c), ischanged(Product_4__c), ischanged(Product_5__c), ischanged(StageName)), or( BEGINS(Product_1__r.Name,"LISA-C"),BEGINS(Product_1__r.Name,"FW"), BEGINS(Product_2__r.Name,"LISA-C"),BEGINS(Product_2__r.Name,"FW"), BEGINS(Product_3__r.Name,"LISA-C"),BEGINS(Product_3__r.Name,"FW"), BEGINS(Product_4__r.Name,"LISA-C"),BEGINS(Product_4__r.Name,"FW"), BEGINS(Product_5__r.Name,"LISA-C"),BEGINS(Product_5__r.Name,"FW"))) */

rules.fullName: Opportunity%3A alert for GSM module project
rules.description: When a GSM module opportunity is created or the stage of the opportunity changes, send an alert to a group of people
rules.formula: true /* commenting this to minimize the number of references. and( or( ischanged(Product_1__c), ischanged(Product_2__c), ischanged(Product_3__c), ischanged(Product_4__c), ischanged(Product_5__c), ischanged(StageName)), or( BEGINS(Product_1__r.Name,"LEON"),BEGINS(Product_1__r.Name,"SARA-G"), BEGINS(Product_2__r.Name,"LEON"),BEGINS(Product_2__r.Name,"SARA-G"), BEGINS(Product_3__r.Name,"LEON"),BEGINS(Product_3__r.Name,"SARA-G"), BEGINS(Product_4__r.Name,"LEON"),BEGINS(Product_4__r.Name,"SARA-G"), BEGINS(Product_5__r.Name,"LEON"),BEGINS(Product_5__r.Name,"SARA-G"))) */

rules.fullName: Opportunity%3A alert for JODY-W1 and THEO-P1
rules.description: When opportunity is created or updated, send an alert to a group of people
rules.formula: true /* commenting this to minimize the number of references. and( or( ISPICKVAL(Product_1__r.Product_Series__c,"THEO-P1"), ISPICKVAL(Product_1__r.Product_Series__c,"JODY-W1"), ISPICKVAL(Product_2__r.Product_Series__c,"THEO-P1"), ISPICKVAL(Product_2__r.Product_Series__c,"JODY-W1"), ISPICKVAL(Product_3__r.Product_Series__c,"THEO-P1"), ISPICKVAL(Product_3__r.Product_Series__c,"JODY-W1"), ISPICKVAL(Product_4__r.Product_Series__c,"THEO-P1"), ISPICKVAL(Product_4__r.Product_Series__c,"JODY-W1"), ISPICKVAL(Product_5__r.Product_Series__c,"THEO-P1"), ISPICKVAL(Product_5__r.Product_Series__c,"JODY-W1") ), or( ISCHANGED( Latest_Status__c ), ISCHANGED( StageName )) ) */

rules.fullName: Opportunity%3A copy previous Stage
rules.description: When a stage changes, copy the previous value to the field "Previous Stage"
rules.formula: ischanged (StageName)

rules.fullName: Opportunity%3A detect design-in and copy date
rules.description: When the opportunity changes its stage to design-in, prototype, pre-production, or production for the first time, copy the date to the field "Design-in Date"
rules.formula: ischanged (StageName) && isnull( Design_win_Date__c ) && OR( ispickval (StageName,"5 Design-in"), ispickval (StageName,"6 Prototypes"), ispickval (StageName,"7 Pre-Production"), ispickval (StageName,"8 Production") )

rules.fullName: Opportunity%3A send mail with information
rules.description: When field "Send mail with opportunity information" is checked, send mail with main information to owner.

rules.fullName: Update opportunity amount
rules.description: Set field equal to Opp Revenue

tasks.description: Please be aware that it is time to update the field Latest Status for this opportunity. Lets see what is the latest news for those big projects!
tasks.subject: Opportunity Latest Status to update

tasks.description: The created record is for one of the embargo countries. Please check the Export Control Guideline provided by Legal (see https://wiki.u-blox.com/bin/view/Generic/LegalHome ).
tasks.subject: Opportunity: embargo country
